dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA notice - hotlinking from one of your clients
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 2004 9:10 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA notice - hotlinking from one of your clients

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Eighties Girl <eightiesgirl@comcast.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, November 16, 2004, 4:38:25 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA notice - hotlinking from one of your clients

===8<==============Original message text===============
One of your clients is hotlinking MY copyrighted exclusive photos from my
affiliate's website.  This is the link:

http://web.aisex.com/pics/messages/721438.html

She has removed the pictures as these people have already cost her over 100
Gigs in bandwidth and both she and I are absolutely livid, but you can see
that it is her server, goth-fetish.com, that is being hotlinked from.

As per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, I require that action be taken
immediately against these people for using my copyrighted images on their
site without permission.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Tara B. Shuler
Macular Media, LLC

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBm2nAvK/XpJs6oyURAshKAJ0W2F4GkgwReo0AnQQTdniqVEbSHQCgiC1G
upBzxXIW5CN5e0Y6RetWMrk=
=J/mI
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
